articles.author: Ben Anderson
articles.title: Ben Anderson's 2024 F1 Miami Grand Prix driver rankings - The Race
articles.description: A first-ever Formula 1 victory for Lando Norris - but did he do enough to take the top spot in our Miami Grand Prix driver rankings?
articles.content:
Formula 1's third Miami Grand Prix was by far its most entertaining as first-time winner Lando Norris defeated Max Verstappen. 
But was Norris the top performer of the weekend? And who else impresse… [+15430 chars]
